p: Culture supernatants were analyzed for their NO concentrations using the Griess reaction by measuring combined oxidation products of NO (NO 2 − and NO 3 −) after reduction with nitrate reductase in a Colorimetric Assay (Cayman Chemical Company, Ann Arbor, MI, USA). The number of amastigotes per 100 macrophages was determined by microscopic examination of Giemsa-stained slides.
